ygData.subject: Re: Web Update
ygData.msgSnippet: I believe you should not send your personal wab page updates to this forum as it does apply to blacksmithing.  If you wish you can send us an update for when
ygData.messageBody:
I believe you should not send your personal wab page updates to this forum
as it does apply to blacksmithing. If you wish you can send us an update
for when you change you blacksmithing guide. Other than that I think that I
can say that WE don't really have an interest in what happens to the rest of
your web site.

There are other forums you could subscribe and send your web page updates
to. This is a blacksmithing one so this is not the place for you.

Thank you.

Ailen
Rallos Zek

-----Original Message-----
From: John Danielson [mailto:clu@...]
Sent: Tuesday, May 04, 1999 12:35 PM
To: EQ_Blacksmiths@onelist.com
Subject: [EQ_Blacksmiths] Re: Web Update


You didn't need to quote the whole thing, and the only way not to receive
those updates is to not subscribe to this mailing list altogether. It'd be
the same if you mailed this list an update of your EQ page (imagine that
you have one), everyone gets it, whether or not their interested.
